        public long ping(java.lang.String id)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Specified by:
        ping in interface RemoteDeadHand
        Returns:
        time in milliseconds to wait till the next ping. Negative return value means "terminate", 0 means "live forever" and should be avoided.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
